title: Die Geschichte vom Astronauten
abstract: A ghost story of abandoned lovers and tangled paths in search of a new voice. The successful writer Charlotte has withdrawn to a mediterranean island, to work on her new novel. For the inspiration she uses the lifestory of other people.
credits: Written, directed and produced by Godehard Giese
Montage by Trang Nguyen & Jules Hermann
Featuring Stefanie Petrowitz, Ruth Diehl, Hubertus Hiess, Ursuala Renneke, Svana Burger & Godehard Giese
awards: Best Production Award, Achtung! berlin film festival 2014
